name: Back Squat
description: A fundamental compound exercise targeting the lower body by squatting with a barbell on the upper back.

name: Bench Press
description: A core upper body exercise involving pressing a barbell upwards while lying on a bench.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound lift that involves lifting a loaded barbell off the floor until the body is erect.

name: Overhead Press
description: Pressing a barbell vertically overhead from a standing or seated position.

name: Pull Ups
description: An upper-body compound pulling exercise using bodyweight.

name: Barbell Rows
description: A compound exercise targeting the back muscles by pulling a barbell towards the torso.

name: Power Clean
description: An explosive Olympic weightlifting movement involving lifting a barbell from the floor to the shoulders.

name: Box Jumps
description: A plyometric exercise involving jumping onto an elevated platform.

name: Sled Push
description: Pushing a weighted sled across a distance, excellent for conditioning and leg drive.

name: Front Squat
description: A squat variation where the barbell rests across the front of the shoulders.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: A hinge movement focusing on the hamstrings and glutes by lowering a barbell with relatively straight legs.

name: Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise performed on parallel bars, targeting chest and triceps.

name: Walking Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise involving stepping forward and lowering the hips.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: A chest press variation performed on an incline bench using dumbbells, emphasizing the upper chest.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A machine-based pulling exercise targeting the latissimus dorsi.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: A rowing exercise using a cable machine, targeting the mid-back.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Pressing dumbbells overhead from a seated or standing position.

name: Lateral Raises
description: An isolation exercise for the side deltoids involving raising dumbbells out to the sides.

name: Front Raises
description: An isolation exercise targeting the front deltoids by raising dumbbells forward.

name: Bent Over Dumbbell Rows
description: A back exercise performed by pulling dumbbells towards the torso while bent over.

name: Triceps Pushdown
description: An isolation exercise for the triceps using a cable machine.

name: Overhead Triceps Extension
description: Extending a dumbbell overhead to target the triceps.

name: Barbell Bicep Curls
description: A fundamental isolation exercise for the biceps using a barbell.

name: Hammer Curls
description: A bicep curl variation with a neutral grip, also targeting the brachialis and forearms.

name: Face Pulls
description: A cable exercise targeting the rear deltoids and upper back muscles, beneficial for shoulder health.

name: Push Ups
description: A classic bodyweight exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Chin Ups
description: A bodyweight pulling exercise with an underhand grip, emphasizing the biceps and lats.

name: Machine Chest Press
description: A machine-based exercise simulating the bench press motion.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
description: A machine-based exercise simulating the overhead press motion.

name: Pec Deck Fly
description: A machine isolation exercise for the chest, mimicking a fly motion.

name: Reverse Pec Deck
description: A machine isolation exercise targeting the rear deltoids and upper back.

name: Skullcrushers
description: A triceps isolation exercise involving lowering a barbell towards the forehead while lying down.

name: Concentration Curls
description: A strict bicep isolation exercise performed seated, bracing the arm against the inner thigh.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine-based compound exercise for the lower body, involving pushing a weight sled away with the legs.

name: Leg Extensions
description: A machine isolation exercise targeting the quadriceps.

name: Hamstring Curls
description: A machine isolation exercise targeting the hamstrings (seated or lying).

name: Glute Bridges
description: An exercise targeting the glutes by lifting the hips off the floor while lying supine.

name: Hip Thrusts
description: A powerful glute exercise involving thrusting the hips upward against resistance (often a barbell) with the upper back supported on a bench.

name: Standing Calf Raises
description: An isolation exercise for the gastrocnemius muscle by raising the heels.

name: Seated Calf Raises
description: An isolation exercise targeting the soleus muscle by raising the heels while seated.

name: Good Mornings
description: A hinge exercise involving bending forward at the hips with a barbell on the back, targeting the posterior chain.

name: Bulgarian Split Squats
description: A single-leg squat variation with the rear foot elevated.

name: Goblet Squat
description: A squat variation holding a single dumbbell or kettlebell vertically against the chest.

name: Kettlebell Swings
description: An explosive hinge movement swinging a kettlebell, targeting the posterior chain and providing cardiovascular benefits.

name: Hack Squat
description: A machine-based squat variation focusing on the quadriceps.

name: Single Leg RDL
description: A unilateral variation of the Romanian Deadlift, challenging balance and targeting the hamstring and glute of one leg.

name: Step Ups
description: A unilateral exercise involving stepping up onto an elevated surface.

name: Clean and Jerk
description: A complex Olympic weightlifting movement involving lifting a barbell from the floor to overhead in two distinct phases: the clean and the jerk.

name: Snatch
description: An explosive Olympic weightlifting movement lifting a barbell from the floor to an overhead position in one continuous motion.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: Carrying heavy weights in each hand over a distance, building grip strength, core stability, and overall conditioning.

name: Tire Flips
description: A strongman exercise involving flipping a large, heavy tire end over end.

name: Sled Drag
description: Pulling a weighted sled, often walking backward, excellent for posterior chain development and conditioning.

name: Battle Ropes
description: A high-intensity conditioning exercise using heavy ropes, primarily targeting the upper body and core.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise holding a push-up like position, engaging the abdominal muscles.

name: Side Plank
description: An isometric core exercise targeting the obliques by holding the body on its side.

name: Russian Twists
description: A core exercise involving twisting the torso side to side, often performed with weight.

name: Crunches
description: A basic abdominal exercise performed by flexing the spine while lying supine.

name: Leg Raises
description: A core exercise targeting the lower abdominals by raising the legs while lying supine.

name: Hanging Leg Raises
description: A more advanced core exercise involving raising the legs while hanging from a bar.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
description: An advanced core exercise performed by rolling a wheel forward and backward while kneeling or standing.

name: Woodchoppers (Cable)
description: A core exercise mimicking a chopping motion using a cable machine, targeting the obliques.

name: Medicine Ball Slams
description: An explosive exercise involving slamming a medicine ball into the ground.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body calisthenic exercise involving a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic bodyweight exercise performed from a plank position, simulating climbing.

name: Turkish Get-Up
description: A complex, multi-stage exercise moving from lying down to standing while holding a weight overhead.

name: Windmills
description: An exercise that improves shoulder stability, core strength, and hip/hamstring mobility, often performed with a kettlebell.

name: Kettlebell Clean and Press
description: A compound kettlebell exercise involving cleaning the kettlebell to the rack position and then pressing it overhead.

name: Hip Abduction Machine
description: A machine exercise isolating the outer hip and glute muscles (gluteus medius/minimus).

name: Hip Adduction Machine
description: A machine exercise isolating the inner thigh muscles (adductors).

name: Reverse Hyperextensions
description: An exercise targeting the glutes, hamstrings, and lower back by lifting the legs while the torso is supported.

name: Back Extensions
description: An exercise targeting the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings by hinging at the hips while the lower body is secured.

name: Glute Ham Raise (GHD)
description: An advanced exercise targeting the hamstrings and glutes using a Glute Ham Developer machine.

name: Decline Bench Press
description: A bench press variation performed on a decline bench, emphasizing the lower chest.

name: Cable Flyes
description: A chest isolation exercise using cables to perform a fly motion (various angles possible).

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: An exercise involving lowering a dumbbell behind the head while lying across a bench, targeting chest and lats.

name: Upright Rows
description: An exercise involving pulling a weight vertically towards the chin, targeting shoulders and traps.

name: Shrugs
description: An isolation exercise for the upper trapezius muscles by elevating the shoulders.

name: Arnold Press
description: A dumbbell shoulder press variation involving rotation during the movement.

name: Rear Delt Flyes
description: An isolation exercise targeting the posterior deltoids (rear shoulder) by moving weights away from the body in a bent-over or machine position.

name: Preacher Curls
description: A bicep isolation exercise performed on a preacher bench to minimize momentum.

name: Cable Curls
description: Bicep curls performed using a cable machine, providing constant tension.

name: Reverse Curls
description: A curl variation with an overhand grip, emphasizing the brachialis and forearm muscles.

name: Close Grip Bench Press
description: A bench press variation with a narrower grip, shifting emphasis to the triceps.

name: Triceps Kickbacks
description: A triceps isolation exercise extending the arm backward against resistance.

name: Bench Dips
description: A bodyweight triceps exercise performed using a bench.

name: Wrist Curls
description: An isolation exercise for the forearm flexors.

name: Reverse Wrist Curls
description: An isolation exercise for the forearm extensors.

name: Lying Leg Curls
description: A machine isolation exercise targeting the hamstrings while lying prone.

name: Seated Leg Curls
description: A machine isolation exercise targeting the hamstrings while seated.

name: Jump Squats
description: A plyometric squat variation involving an explosive jump at the top.

name: Pistol Squats
description: An advanced single-leg bodyweight squat requiring significant strength, balance, and mobility.

name: Nordic Hamstring Curls
description: A challenging bodyweight exercise focusing on the eccentric strength of the hamstrings.

name: Sissy Squats
description: An exercise isolating the quadriceps by leaning back while keeping the hips extended.

name: Hyperextensions (45 Degree)
description: Similar to Back Extensions, performed on a 45-degree hyperextension bench.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
description: A squat holding a kettlebell by the horns against the chest.

name: Kettlebell Sumo Deadlift
description: A deadlift variation with a wider stance, performed with one or two kettlebells.

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
description: A unilateral rowing exercise performed with one dumbbell, often bracing against a bench.

name: Pendlay Rows
description: A strict barbell row variation where the bar starts and returns to the floor on each rep.

name: T-Bar Rows
description: A rowing exercise using a T-bar apparatus or a barbell wedged into a corner.

name: Straight Arm Pulldown
description: An isolation exercise for the lats using a cable machine, keeping the arms relatively straight.

name: Chest Supported Rows
description: A rowing variation performed with the chest supported on a bench or machine pad, minimizing lower back involvement.

name: Incline Barbell Press
description: A barbell press performed on an incline bench, targeting the upper chest and shoulders.

name: Floor Press
description: A pressing variation performed lying on the floor, limiting range of motion and emphasizing triceps.

name: Landmine Press
description: Pressing one end of a barbell anchored in a landmine unit, often performed kneeling or standing.

name: Z Press
description: An overhead press performed seated on the floor with legs straight, demanding core stability and shoulder strength.

name: Cable Lateral Raises
description: Lateral raises performed using a cable machine for constant tension on the side deltoids.

name: Push Press
description: An overhead press variation using leg drive to initiate the movement, allowing heavier weight.

name: JM Press
description: A hybrid exercise between a close-grip bench press and a skullcrusher, targeting the triceps.

name: Single Leg Press
description: Leg press performed one leg at a time to address imbalances.

name: Leg Kickbacks (Cable/Machine)
description: An isolation exercise for the glutes, kicking the leg backward against resistance.

name: Sumo Squat
description: A squat variation with a wide stance, targeting the glutes and inner thighs (adductors) more.

name: Wall Balls
description: A full-body exercise combining a front squat with an overhead throw of a medicine ball against a wall.

name: Toes to Bar
description: An advanced core exercise performed hanging from a bar, lifting the toes to touch the bar.

name: Kneeling Cable Crunches
description: A weighted crunch variation performed kneeling using a cable machine.

name: Cable Woodchoppers (High to Low)
description: A woodchop variation moving the cable from a high anchor point diagonally down across the body.

name: Cable Woodchoppers (Low to High)
description: A woodchop variation moving the cable from a low anchor point diagonally up across the body.

name: Pallof Press
description: An anti-rotation core exercise performed by pressing a cable or band handle away from the chest while resisting rotational forces.

name: Decline Crunches
description: Crunches performed on a decline bench, increasing the range of motion and difficulty.

name: Stability Ball Crunches
description: Crunches performed on a stability ball, increasing core activation and range of motion.

name: Stability Ball Pike
description: An advanced core exercise involving pulling the feet on a stability ball towards the hands, lifting the hips into a pike position.

name: Stability Ball Rollout
description: Similar to an ab wheel rollout, but performed using a stability ball.

name: Reverse Crunches
description: A core exercise targeting the lower abdominals by lifting the knees towards the chest.

name: Hanging Knee Raises
description: A core exercise involving raising the knees towards the chest while hanging from a bar.

name: Captain's Chair Leg Raise
description: Leg or knee raises performed on a Captain's Chair apparatus, providing back support.

name: Dead Bug
description: A core stability exercise involving lowering opposite arm and leg while maintaining a neutral spine.

name: Bird Dog
description: A core stability exercise performed on all fours, extending opposite arm and leg while maintaining a neutral spine.

name: Plank Jacks
description: A dynamic plank variation involving jumping the feet in and out like a jumping jack.

name: Side Plank Dips
description: A dynamic side plank variation involving dipping the hips towards the floor.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: A core exercise involving bringing opposite elbow to opposite knee in a cycling motion.

name: V-Ups
description: An advanced core exercise involving simultaneously lifting the torso and legs towards each other.

name: Hollow Hold / Hollow Body Hold
description: An isometric core exercise fundamental in gymnastics, involving holding a 'dish' shape off the ground.

name: Arch Hold / Superman
description: An isometric exercise strengthening the posterior chain by lifting arms and legs off the ground while lying prone.

name: Suitcase Carry
description: A unilateral loaded carry holding a weight in one hand like a suitcase, challenging core stability (anti-lateral flexion).

name: Waiter's Walk
description: A unilateral loaded carry holding a weight overhead with a straight arm, challenging shoulder and core stability.

name: Overhead Carry
description: A loaded carry holding weight(s) overhead (barbell, two dumbbells/kettlebells), demanding significant shoulder and core stability.

name: Bear Crawl
description: A crawling movement pattern performed on hands and feet with knees slightly off the ground.

name: Crab Walk
description: A movement pattern performed walking on hands and feet with the chest facing upwards.

name: Zercher Squat
description: A squat variation holding the barbell in the crook of the elbows.

name: Sumo Deadlift High Pull
description: An explosive movement combining a sumo deadlift with an upright row/high pull.

name: Thruster
description: A compound exercise combining a front squat with a push press in one fluid motion.

name: Bar Muscle Up
description: An advanced gymnastics movement transitioning from below a pull-up bar to a support position above it.

name: Ring Muscle Up
description: An advanced gymnastics movement on rings, transitioning from below the rings to a support dip position above them.

name: Ring Dips
description: Dips performed on gymnastic rings, requiring greater stability than bar dips.

name: Ring Rows / Bodyweight Rows
description: A horizontal pulling exercise using gymnastic rings or a suspension trainer, adjustable by foot position.

name: Inverted Rows
description: Similar to Ring Rows, often performed using a barbell set low in a rack.

name: Deficit Deadlifts
description: A deadlift variation performed while standing on an elevated surface, increasing the range of motion.

name: Rack Pulls
description: A deadlift variation performed with the barbell starting at an elevated position (e.g., knee height) in a power rack, allowing for heavier loads and targeting the upper back and lockout.

name: Snatch Grip Deadlift
description: A deadlift performed with a wide (snatch) grip, increasing range of motion and upper back engagement.

name: Pause Squat
description: A squat variation involving a distinct pause at the bottom of the movement.

name: Pause Bench Press
description: A bench press variation involving a distinct pause with the bar on the chest.

name: Box Squat
description: A squat variation involving squatting down until seated briefly on a box, emphasizing the posterior chain.

name: Safety Bar Squat
description: A squat variation using a safety squat bar, which alters weight distribution and reduces shoulder strain.

name: Dumbbell Flyes
description: A chest isolation exercise using dumbbells in a fly (arc) motion, typically on a flat or incline bench.

name: Seated Dip Machine
description: An isolation exercise for the triceps using a cable machine.

name: Single Arm Cable Pushdown
description: An isolation exercise for the triceps using a cable machine.

name: Tricep Pushdowns
description: A cable exercise targeting the triceps. Stand facing a cable machine with a rope or bar attachment at head height. Push the attachment down until your arms are fully extended.

name: Lat Pulldowns
description: A cable exercise targeting the lats. Sit at a lat pulldown machine with a wide grip on the bar. Pull the bar down to your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
